item.title: Video creation/shooting - Upwork
item.description:
Title: Videographer/Video Creator Wanted for Short-Term Rental Promotion

Role: We're seeking a talented and creative videographer/video creator to help us promote our short-term rental property on social media platforms like Instagram Reels and TikTok. The goal is to create visually appealing and engaging videos that will drive organic traffic and increase bookings.

Responsibilities:

- Conceptualize and produce high-quality, eye-catching videos showcasing the property's unique features, amenities, and surroundings.
- Develop creative concepts and storylines that align with the property's brand and target audience.
- Shoot, edit, and post visually stunning Reels and TikTok videos on a regular basis, following best practices for each platform.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure consistency with the overall marketing strategy and branding guidelines.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, algorithms, and best practices for Reels and TikTok to maximize engagement and reach.
- Analyze video performance metrics and provide insights for optimization and improvement.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in videography, video editing, and social media content creation, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
- Excellent storytelling and creative skills, with the ability to capture the essence of the property in a visually compelling manner.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) and familiarity with popular social media platforms and their video formats.
- Knowledge of video optimization techniques, including captioning, hashtags, and trending sounds/music.
- Strong understanding of social media algorithms and best practices for maximizing organic reach and engagement.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for travel, hospitality, and creating captivating visual content.

This is a freelance/contract position with the potential for long-term collaboration based on performance.

Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and vision for promoting our short-term rental property.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:07 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality, Aerial Photography, Drone Videography, Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality, Aerial Photography, Drone Videography, Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
